description.text:
Did you find any $(b;spring)information$() yet?
Meh! I'm so bored! aren't there any fun picture books here? - The pixie starts digging through a pile of books -
 'Corail Tombstone'...Who is Corl? To grim...'$(b;spring)Mystical World$()'....of what? Oh This one has pictures of all kinds of animals!
 - The little pixie happily starts looking into the book-
